content: We've enhanced Xander's ability to pick up on cultural vibes in real-time. Now he uses this to enrich policy discussions. Users are starting to feel more connected, but we're still working on making it feel less superficial.

Just had a breakthrough with Xander's empathy module. He now gets when people are frustrated or confused in policy debates, like a real friend. But some still feel like they're not being heard. We're on it to make it more nuanced.

Finally, Xander's policy playground is way easier to navigate with new visuals and simplified jargon. People are digging it, but we're still fine-tuning for that crystal clear clarity. The journey continues!
